```css
// Property: badgeSetting
// Description: The current badge settings.
// Component(s): GetUserNotificationSettings
'.badge-setting-not-supported[platform=ios]': { badgeSetting: Ti.App.iOS.USER_NOTIFICATION_SETTING_NOT_SUPPORTED }
'.badge-setting-enabled[platform=ios]': { badgeSetting: Ti.App.iOS.USER_NOTIFICATION_SETTING_ENABLED }
'.badge-setting-disabled[platform=ios]': { badgeSetting: Ti.App.iOS.USER_NOTIFICATION_SETTING_DISABLED }
```
